app_descript:
Vipo: Ultimate Photo Editor

Brief: Vipo is a robust photo editing application that elevates your photography with exclusive effects and professional-grade controls. Whether you're aiming for a vintage look with dust effects or precise color manipulation through HSL, Vipo provides a comprehensive suite of tools for both casual and serious photographers. Crop, rotate, and fine-tune your images to perfection, and add a personal touch with various fonts for textual overlays. Vipo is your pocket-sized studio, transforming ordinary pictures into striking works of art.
